sentences.sContent: a shirt autographed by the whole team
sentences.sCn: 一件有全体队员签名的衬衫

synos.tran: 亲笔，[图情]手稿；[法]亲笔签名

remMethod.val: auto(自己)+graph(写， 画)→写下自己的名字→签名

trans.tranOther: if a famous person autographs a book, photograph etc, they sign it
a famous person’s signature that they give to someone who admires them
